First Post with Github!

if this works... wow

  • 01 Mar 2014
  • Montreal, Canada

This is my first official blog post using Jekyll. This post that was created by making a new file on my github profile. How. Cool.

You can see my initial amazement of the process in the title of this post. :)

Adam

This website is built with Jekyll and is opensource on Github
